---
name: Enhancement
about: Suggest an improvement to an existing feature
title: '[ENHANCEMENT] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Description
A clear and concise description of the enhancement you'd like to see.

## Current Behavior
Describe how the current feature works.

## Proposed Enhancement
Describe the improvement you'd like to see.

## Benefits
What benefits would this enhancement provide?

## Additional Context
Add any other context, examples, or mockups about the enhancement here.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Enhancement is clearly defined
- [ ] Backward compatibility is maintained (if applicable)
- [ ] Tests are updated/added
- [ ] Documentation is updated
- [ ] Enhancement is reviewed and merged
